description: At least one credit item or custom line item is required.

id.description: Required when editing an existing credit item

inventory_id.description: Required when creating a new credit item

count.description: Required when creating a new credit item

_destroy.description: Setting this to true will delete the specified credit item

id.description: Required when editing an existing custom line item

custom_line_definition_id.description: Required when creating a new custom line item

count.description: Required when creating a new custom line item

_destroy.description: Setting this to true will delete the specified custom line item
